arabic: فَاِذَا نُفِخَ فِى الصُّوْرِ فَلَآ اَنْسَابَ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَىِٕذٍ وَّلَا يَتَسَاۤءَلُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Fa izaa nufikha fis Soori falaaa ansaaba bainahum yawma'izinw wa laa yatasaaa'aloon
transliteration_id: Fa iżā nufikha fiṣ-ṣūri falā ansāba bainahum yauma'iżiw wa lā yatasā'alūn(a).
translation_en: So when the Horn is blown, no relationship will there be among them that Day, nor will they ask about one another.
translation_id: Apabila sangkakala ditiup, pada hari itu (hari Kiamat) tidak ada lagi pertalian keluarga di antara mereka dan tidak (pula) mereka saling bertanya.

arabic: فَمَنْ ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِيْنُهٗ فَاُولٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Faman saqulat mawaazee nuhoo fa ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon
transliteration_id: Faman ṡaqulat mawāzīnuhū fa ulā'ika humul-mufliḥūn(a).
translation_en: And those whose scales are heavy [with good deeds] - it is they who are the successful.
translation_id: Siapa yang berat timbangan (kebaikan)-nya, mereka itulah orang-orang beruntung.

arabic: وَمَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَازِيْنُهٗ فَاُولٰۤىِٕكَ الَّذِيْنَ خَسِرُوْٓا اَنْفُسَهُمْ فِيْ جَهَنَّمَ خٰلِدُوْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Wa man khaffat mawaa zeenuhoo fa ulaaa'ikal lazeena khasiroon anfusahum fee Jahannnama khaalidoon
transliteration_id: Wa man khaffat mawāzīnuhū fa ulā'ikal-lażīna khasirū anfusahum fī jahannama khālidūn(a).
translation_en: But those whose scales are light - those are the ones who have lost their souls, [being] in Hell, abiding eternally.
translation_id: Siapa yang ringan timbangan (kebaikan)-nya, mereka itulah orang-orang yang merugikan dirinya sendiri. Mereka kekal di dalam (neraka) Jahanam.

arabic: تَلْفَحُ وُجُوْهَهُمُ النَّارُ وَهُمْ فِيْهَا كٰلِحُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Talfahu wujoohahumun Naaru wa hum feehaa kaalihood
transliteration_id: Talfaḥu wujūhahumun-nāru wa hum fīhā kāliḥūn(a).
translation_en: The Fire will sear their faces, and they therein will have taut smiles.
translation_id: Wajah mereka dibakar api neraka dan mereka di neraka dalam keadaan sangat menyeramkan.

arabic: اَلَمْ تَكُنْ اٰيٰتِيْ تُتْلٰى عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنْتُمْ بِهَا تُكَذِّبُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Alam takun Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum fakuntum bihaa tukazziboon
transliteration_id: Alam takun āyātī tutlā ‘alaikum fa kuntum bihā tukażżibūn(a).
translation_en: [It will be said]. "Were not My verses recited to you and you used to deny them?"
translation_id: Bukankah ayat-ayat-Ku telah dibacakan kepadamu, tetapi kamu selalu mendustakannya?

arabic: قَالُوْا رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتْ عَلَيْنَا شِقْوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوْمًا ضَاۤلِّيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaaloo Rabbanaa ghalabat 'alainaa shiqwatunaa wa kunnaa qawman daaalleen
transliteration_id: Qālū rabbanā galabat ‘alainā syiqwatunā wa kunnā qauman ḍāllīn(a).
translation_en: They will say, "Our Lord, our wretchedness overcame us, and we were a people astray.
translation_id: Mereka berkata, “Ya Tuhan kami, kedurhakaan kami telah menguasai kami dan kami adalah orang-orang yang sesat.

arabic: رَبَّنَآ اَخْرِجْنَا مِنْهَا فَاِنْ عُدْنَا فَاِنَّا ظٰلِمُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Rabbanaa akhrijnaa minhaa fa in 'udnaa fa innaa zaalimoon
transliteration_id: Rabbanā akhrijnā minhā fa in ‘udnā fa innā ẓālimūn(a).
translation_en: Our Lord, remove us from it, and if we were to return [to evil], we would indeed be wrongdoers."
translation_id: Ya Tuhan kami, keluarkanlah kami darinya (api neraka dan kembalikan ke dunia). Kemudian, jika kami masih mengulangi (kekafiran), sesungguhnya kami adalah orang-orang zalim.”

transliteration_en: Qaalakh sa'oo feehaa wa laa tukallimoon
translation_en: He will say, "Remain despised therein and do not speak to Me.
translation_id: Dia (Allah) berfirman, “Tinggallah kamu di sana dengan hina dan janganlah berbicara dengan-Ku.”

arabic: اِنَّهٗ كَانَ فَرِيْقٌ مِّنْ عِبَادِيْ يَقُوْلُوْنَ رَبَّنَآ اٰمَنَّا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا وَارْحَمْنَا وَاَنْتَ خَيْرُ الرّٰحِمِيْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Innahoo kaana fareequm min 'ibaadee yaqooloona Rabbanaaa aamannaa faghfir lanaa warhamnaa wa Anta khairur raahimeen
transliteration_id: Innahū kāna farīqum min ‘ibādī yaqūlūna rabbanā āmannā fagfir lanā warḥamnā wa anta khairur-rāḥimīn(a).
translation_en: Indeed, there was a party of My servants who said, 'Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us and have mercy upon us, and You are the best of the merciful.'
translation_id: Sesungguhnya segolongan dari hamba-hamba-Ku berdoa, “Ya Tuhan kami, kami telah beriman, maka ampunilah kami dan berilah kami rahmat. Engkau adalah sebaik-baik pemberi rahmat.”

arabic: فَاتَّخَذْتُمُوْهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا حَتّٰىٓ اَنْسَوْكُمْ ذِكْرِيْ وَكُنْتُمْ مِّنْهُمْ تَضْحَكُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Fattakhaztumoohum sikhriyyan hattaaa ansawkum zikree wa kuntum minhum tadhakoon
transliteration_id: Fattakhażtumūhum sikhriyyan ḥattā ansaukum żikrī wa kuntum minhum taḍḥakūn(a).
translation_en: But you took them in mockery to the point that they made you forget My remembrance, and you used to laugh at them.
translation_id: Lalu, kamu jadikan mereka bahan ejekan sehingga itu membuatmu lupa mengingat-Ku dan kamu (selalu) menertawakan mereka.

arabic: اِنِّيْ جَزَيْتُهُمُ الْيَوْمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوْٓاۙ اَنَّهُمْ هُمُ الْفَاۤىِٕزُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Inee jazaituhumul Yawma bimaa sabarooo annahum humul faaa'izoon
transliteration_id: Innī jazaituhumul-yauma bimā ṣabarū, annahum humul-fā'izūn(a).
translation_en: Indeed, I have rewarded them this Day for their patient endurance - that they are the attainers [of success]."
translation_id: Sesungguhnya pada hari ini Aku memberi balasan kepada mereka karena kesabaran mereka. Sesungguhnya mereka itulah orang-orang yang menang.

arabic: قٰلَ كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ فِى الْاَرْضِ عَدَدَ سِنِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala kam labistum fil ardi 'adada sineen
translation_en: [Allah] will say, "How long did you remain on earth in number of years?"
translation_id: Dia (Allah) berfirman, “Berapa tahunkah lamanya kamu tinggal di bumi?”

arabic: قَالُوْا لَبِثْنَا يَوْمًا اَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍ فَسْـَٔلِ الْعَاۤدِّيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaaloo labisnaa yawman aw ba'da yawmin fas'alil 'aaaddeen
transliteration_id: Qālū labiṡnā yauman au baḍa yaumin fas'alil-‘āddīn(a).
translation_en: They will say, "We remained a day or part of a day; ask those who enumerate."
translation_id: Mereka menjawab, “Kami tinggal (di bumi) sehari atau setengah hari. Tanyalah kepada mereka yang menghitung.”

arabic: قٰلَ اِنْ لَّبِثْتُمْ اِلَّا قَلِيْلًا لَّوْ اَنَّكُمْ كُنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala il labistum illaa qaleelal law annakum kuntum ta'lamoon
transliteration_id: Qāla il labiṡtum illā qalīlal lau annakum kuntum ta‘lamūn(a).
translation_en: He will say, "You stayed not but a little - if only you had known.
translation_id: Dia (Allah) berfirman, “Kamu tinggal (di bumi) hanya sebentar jika kamu benar-benar mengetahui.”

arabic: اَفَحَسِبْتُمْ اَنَّمَا خَلَقْنٰكُمْ عَبَثًا وَّاَنَّكُمْ اِلَيْنَا لَا تُرْجَعُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Afahsibtum annamaa khalaqnaakum 'abasanw wa annakum ilainaa laa turja'oon
transliteration_id: Afa ḥasibtum annamā khalaqnākum ‘abaṡaw wa annakum ilainā lā turja‘ūn(a).
translation_en: Then did you think that We created you uselessly and that to Us you would not be returned?"
translation_id: Apakah kamu mengira bahwa Kami menciptakan kamu main-main (tanpa ada maksud) dan kamu tidak akan dikembalikan kepada Kami?

arabic: فَتَعٰلَى اللّٰهُ الْمَلِكُ الْحَقُّۚ  لَآ اِلٰهَ اِلَّا هُوَۚ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْكَرِيْمِ
transliteration_en: Fata'aalal laahul Malikul Haqq; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa Rabbul 'Arshil Kareem
transliteration_id: Fa ta‘ālallāhul-malikul-ḥaqq(u), lā ilāha illā huw(a), rabbul-‘arsyil-karīm(i).
translation_en: So exalted is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth; there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Noble Throne.
translation_id: Maha Tinggi Allah, Raja yang sebenarnya. Tidak ada tuhan selain Dia, pemilik ‘Arasy yang mulia.

arabic: وَمَنْ يَّدْعُ مَعَ اللّٰهِ اِلٰهًا اٰخَرَ لَا بُرْهَانَ لَهٗ بِهٖۙ فَاِنَّمَا حِسَابُهٗ عِنْدَ رَبِّهٖۗ اِنَّهٗ لَا يُفْلِحُ الْكٰفِرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa mai yad'u ma'allaahi ilaahan aakhara laa burhaana lahoo bihee fa innnamaa hisaabuhoo 'inda Rabbih; innahoo laa yuflihul kaafiroon
transliteration_id: Wa may yad‘u ma‘allāhi ilāhan ākhara lā burhāna lahū bih(ī), fa innamā ḥisābuhū ‘inda rabbih(ī), innahū lā yufliḥul-kāfirūn(a).
translation_en: And whoever invokes besides Allah another deity for which he has no proof - then his account is only with his Lord. Indeed, the disbelievers will not succeed.
translation_id: Siapa yang menyembah tuhan yang lain bersama Allah, padahal tidak ada suatu bukti pun baginya (yang membenarkan) tentang itu, maka perhitungan (amal)-nya hanya pada Tuhannya. Sesungguhnya orang-orang kafir itu tidak akan beruntung.

arabic: وَقُلْ رَّبِّ اغْفِرْ وَارْحَمْ وَاَنْتَ خَيْرُ الرّٰحِمِيْنَ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Wa qur Rabbigh fir warham wa Anta khairur raahimeen
transliteration_id: Wa qur rabbigfir warḥam wa anta khairur-rāḥimīn(a).
translation_en: And, [O Muhammad], say, "My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful."
translation_id: Katakanlah (Nabi Muhammad), “Ya Tuhanku, berilah ampunan dan rahmat. Engkaulah sebaik-baik pemberi rahmat.”
